name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Python Engineer with 8 years of experience, I have a strong focus on **Python**, and extensive expertise in **Flask**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** for developing scalable applications. My technical arsenal includes proficiency in **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and robust CI/CD pipelines for streamlined deployments, ensuring high-quality code and efficient runtime management. I am adept at leveraging **AWS** cloud services along with databases such as **MongoDB** and **PostgreSQL** to build high-performing systems.

Additionally, my background in microservices architecture enhances application scalability and maintainability. I excel in using collaborative tools like **JIRA**, **Confluence**, and **Slack**, which helps streamline project management and team communication. I am experienced in monitoring and logging solutions such as **Grafana**, **ELK Stack**, and **New Relic**, ensuring optimal application performance and reliability.

With proven skills in event-driven systems and a commitment to compliance standards, I have successfully developed enterprise-level solutions across industries, including healthcare and finance, while integrating AI/ML capabilities for enhanced data analytics and automation.
